greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Minimal order of degree-n irreducible polynomials over GF(13).
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Irreducible Polynomial
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Polynomial Order
formula: a(n) = min(M(n)) with M(n) = {d : d|(13^n-1)} \ U(n-1) and U(n) = M(n) union U(n-1) for n>0, U(0) = {}.
maple: M:= proc(n) M(n):= divisors(13^n-1) minus U(n-1) end:
U:= proc(n) U(n):= `if`(n=0, {}, M(n) union U(n-1)) end:
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 27 2012
